'''Nayram''' is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in the {{Quest|For Her Judgment Reaches to the Skies...}}. 

==Profile==
Nayram was one of [[Babel]]'s assassins. The Matriarch sent her and [[Rezki]] to kill the [[Traveler]] in order to secure possession of [[Liloupar]] as part of her plan to occupy [[The Orchard of Pairidaeza]]. Nayram and Rezki failed in their mission, being defeated by [[Jeht]] and the Traveler.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|For Her Judgment Reaches to the Skies...}}</ref>

===Appearance===
Nayram takes on the appearance of an [[Eremite Axe Vanguard]].
